SettingsProxy.name: GeneralSettings
SettingsProxy.label: General
SettingsProxy.Documentation: Collection of general setting for ParaView.

IntVectorProperty.name: ShowWelcomeDialog
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Show welcome screen at startup.

IntVectorProperty.name: ShowSaveStateOnExit
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Prompt to save state when exiting ParaView.

IntVectorProperty.name: CrashRecovery
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: On a crash, attempt to save a state file to potentially restore the application state to that before the crash.

IntVectorProperty.name: ForceSingleColumnMenus
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Force the sources/filters menus to be presented as a single scrollable column to ensure that all the filters are selectable on low resolution screens.

IntVectorProperty.name: GUIOverrideFont
IntVectorProperty.label: Override Font
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Override the GUI font size. Uncheck to use system default.

IntVectorProperty.name: GUIFontSize
IntVectorProperty.label: Font Size
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify the font size in points.

StringVectorProperty.name: DefaultViewType
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the view to create when ParaView starts up.

IntVectorProperty.name: ScreenPixelsPerInch
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set pixels per inch on the current screen/monitor. This is used for determining pixel sizes for fonts and other 2D annotations.

IntVectorProperty.name: AutoApply
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Automatically apply changes in the 'Properties' panel.

IntVectorProperty.name: AutoApplyActiveOnly
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Limit automatic accepting of changes on the 'Properties' panel to the active panel alone.

IntVectorProperty.name: LoadAllVariables
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Load all variables when loading a data set.

IntVectorProperty.name: LoadNoChartVariables
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Do not load any variables when loading a 2D chart.

IntVectorProperty.name: PropertiesPanelMode
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: You can choose to show source, display and view properties in a single 'Properties' panel, or place them in separate dock panels.

Entry.text: Display Properties in a separate panel
View Properties in a separate panel
Separate panels for each type of properties

IntVectorProperty.name: LockPanels
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Prevent movement of dockable control panels to other positions.

IntVectorProperty.name: AutoConvertProperties
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Automatically convert data arrays as needed by filters including converting cell arrays to point arrays, or vice versa, and extracting single components from multi-component arrays.

IntVectorProperty.name: BlockColorsDistinctValues
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Determines the number of distinct values in vtkBlockColors. This array is added to each block if the dataset is a composite dataset. The array has one value set to the reminder of blockIndex divided by BlockColorsDistinctValues (blockIndex mod BlockColorsDistinctValues).

IntVectorProperty.name: TransferFunctionResetMode
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Color transfer functions (or color maps) are used to map data values to colors for pseudo coloring. Set the default way ParaView decides to update the data range used for this mapping. Newly created transfer functions will update the range according to this setting, but it can later be changed per transfer function via the transfer function's 'Automatic Rescale Range Mode' setting.

IntVectorProperty.name: ScalarBarMode
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set how ParaView manages showing of color legend bars (or scalar bars) in render views.

Entry.text: Automatically show and/or hide color bars

IntVectorProperty.name: EnableAutoMPI
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enable multicore support for data processing.

IntVectorProperty.name: AutoMPILimit
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Limit maximum number of cores to

IntVectorProperty.name: CacheGeometryForAnimation
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enable caching of geometry in an attempt to speed up animation playback in a loop.

IntVectorProperty.name: AnimationGeometryCacheLimit
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When caching of geometry for animations is enabled, limit the maximum cache size for the geometry on any rank. Caching will automatically be disabled if the cache exceed this limit on any rank, specified in kilobytes (KB).

IntVectorProperty.name: AnimationTimeNotation
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the display notation for the time in the animation toolbar. 'Mixed' will automatically choose the shortest display.

IntVectorProperty.name: AnimationTimePrecision
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the number of significant digits displayed for the time in the animation toolbar. Should be in the range [1,17].

IntVectorProperty.name: ShowAnimationShortcuts
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set whether to show or not an animation shortcut button on ranged scalar property.

IntVectorProperty.name: ResetDisplayEmptyViews
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When showing a representation in an empty view, set wether or not to reset the view display.

IntVectorProperty.name: RealNumberDisplayedNotation
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the notation used to display real numbers.

IntVectorProperty.name: RealNumberDisplayedPrecision
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the number of significant digits to display in real numbers. This does NOT affect the values used in computation.

IntVectorProperty.name: InheritRepresentationProperties
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set whether representations try to maintain properties from an input representation, if present. e.g. if you "Transform" the representation for a source, then any filter that you connect to it and show in the same view should be transformed using the same transformation as well.

IntVectorProperty.name: DefaultTimeStep
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Any time a new dataset with timesteps is opened, set the timestep the application should go to by default.

Entry.text: Leave current time unchanged, if possible

IntVectorProperty.name: MaximumNumberOfDataRepresentationLabels
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set how many points should be labeled when labeling points with data. If there are more point than this then only a subset will be labeled. This helps when many points are selected and the number of labels would make then unreadable.

IntVectorProperty.name: ColorByBlockColorsOnApply
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Internal setting: automatically color by **vtkBlockColors** if array is present.

IntVectorProperty.name: IgnoreNegativeLogAxisWarning
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When plotting data with nonpositive values using logarithmic axes, ignore the standard warning and draw only the data with positive values. Changes will take effect for all charts created after this option is changed.

PropertyGroup.label: Multicore Support
PropertyGroup.Documentation: On multicore systems, ParaView can run parallel pvserver processes automatically, without you having to launch them manually for processing data in parallel.

IntVectorProperty.name: ResolveCoincidentTopology
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the mode to use to overcome the OpenGL rendering issue when faces coincide with lines and points.

Entry.text: Offset faces relative to lines and points
Offset lines and points relative to faces
Shift z-buffer when rendering lines and points

DoubleVectorProperty.name: PolygonOffsetParameters
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the polygon offset parameters. Refer to the OpenGL manual, glPolygonOffset for details on how to use these parameters.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: ZShift
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the fraction by which to shift the z-buffer range when rendering lines and points.

IntVectorProperty.name: DepthPeeling
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enable depth-peeling to correctly render translucent polygons. May slow down rendering performance.

IntVectorProperty.name: DepthPeelingForVolumes
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Include volumes in the depth-peeling pass to correctly render intermixed volumes with translucent polygons. May slow down rendering performance.

IntVectorProperty.name: MaximumNumberOfPeels
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the maximum number of peels to use when depth peeling is employed.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseFXAA
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enable FXAA antialiasing on 3D geometry.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: FXAARelativeContrastThreshold
DoubleVectorProperty.label: Relative Contrast Threshold
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Contrast threshold for applying FXAA to a pixel, relative to max luminance. Lower values will affect more edges. Default is 0.125.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: FXAAHardContrastThreshold
DoubleVectorProperty.label: Hard Contrast Threshold
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Hard contrast threshold for applying FXAA to a pixel. Lower values will affect more edges. Default is 0.045.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: FXAASubpixelBlendLimit
DoubleVectorProperty.label: Subpixel Blend Limit
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Maximum amount of lowpass filtering to apply to the final pixel color to correct subpixel aliasing. Default value is 0.75.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: FXAASubpixelContrastThreshold
DoubleVectorProperty.label: Subpixel Contrast Threshold
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Contrast threshold for subpixel aliasing detection. Higher values decrease sensitivity to subpixel aliasing. Default value is 0.25.

IntVectorProperty.name: FXAAUseHighQualityEndpoints
IntVectorProperty.label: Improve Single Pixel Lines
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When enabled, a more sensitive endpoint detection method is used. Disabling this will improve performance, but single-pixel lines will have noticeable artifacts. Default is On.

IntVectorProperty.name: FXAAEndpointSearchIterations
IntVectorProperty.label: Endpoint Search Iterations
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Endpoint detection radius. Higher values will provide higher quality aliasing for long edges, but performance will suffer. Default is 12.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: LODThreshold
DoubleVectorProperty.label: LOD Threshold
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the data size (in megabytes) beyond which to employ decimation, if possible, to speed renders when interacting. 0 implies the use of decimation for all interactive renders.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: LODResolution
DoubleVectorProperty.label: LOD Resolution
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the factor used to compute the decimated geometry when employed. This affects the size of the grid used for quadric clustering, for example. 1.0 implies maximum resolution while 0 implies minimum resolution.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: NonInteractiveRenderDelay
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: If decimated geometry was used for rendering during interaction, set the delay (in seconds) before doing a full resolution render when the interaction is finished.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseOutlineForLODRendering
IntVectorProperty.label: Use Outline For LOD Rendering
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Use outline, instead of decimated geometry when interacting, if applicable.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: RemoteRenderThreshold
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the data size (in megabytes) beyond which to render data remotely (or in parallel) when connected to parallel rendering capable server. In that case the rendered images are delivered to the client. Otherwise, the geometry is delivered to the client and rendering happens locally.

IntVectorProperty.name: StillRenderImageReductionFactor
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the sub-sampling factor to use for non-interactive rendering. When rendering on large tiles (or multiple tiles), sub-sampling will help improve image compositing performance. This has no effect if remote/parallel rendering is not being used.

IntVectorProperty.name: ImageReductionFactor
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: To reduce image compositing costs during interactions, set the image sub-sampling factor. Set to 1 to not use any subsampling.

StringVectorProperty.name: CompressorConfig
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the compression method used when transferring rendered images from the server to the client.

IntVectorProperty.name: OutlineThreshold
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When opening a dataset or creating a new filters, use Outline representation, if possible, when showing datasets with number of cells greater than thus threshold (in millions).

IntVectorProperty.name: DefaultInteractionMode
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When opening a dataset, set the initial interaction mode.

Entry.text: Automatic, based on the first time step

IntVectorProperty.name: ShowAnnotation
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set whether to see annotation providing advanced debugging and performance information about each render.

IntVectorProperty.name: PointPickingRadius
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the radius (in pixels) to include when using *Select Points On* to click-and-select a single point on the **Render View**.

IntVectorProperty.name: DisableIceT
IntVectorProperty.label: Disable IceT
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set to disable IceT (default is unchecked). This is not common and only provided for special rendering modes/mappers.

IntVectorProperty.name: Camera3DManipulators
IntVectorProperty.label: Camera 3D Manipulators
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Select how interactions are mapped to camera movements when in 3D interaction mode.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Camera3DMouseWheelMotionFactor
DoubleVectorProperty.label: 3D Mouse Wheel Factor
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the wheel motion factor for 3D interaction.

IntVectorProperty.name: Camera2DManipulators
IntVectorProperty.label: Camera 2D Manipulators
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Select how interactions are mapped to camera movements when in 2D interaction mode.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Camera2DMouseWheelMotionFactor
DoubleVectorProperty.label: 2D Mouse Wheel Factor
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the wheel motion factor for 2D interaction.

StringVectorProperty.name: FilterExpressions
StringVectorProperty.label: Filter Expressions
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: List of expressions used to filter out arrays you do not want to display in the color array list.
